title: Bulgari Offers a $39,000 Hotel Suite for Those Who Might Spend Millions on a Necklace
sub_head: In-room jewelry viewings and sneak peeks of new collections are perks of staying at the jeweler’s growing list of hotel properties
body:
PARIS—Who would pay more than $39,000 a night for a hotel suite?
The Italian jeweler Bulgari is betting it is someone who would spend millions of dollars more for one of its emerald, sapphire and diamond-encrusted necklaces.
